definition: to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: These are the symptoms of pregnancy in the subject.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是进行中受孕期的征候。

sentences.english: Ovulation signs and symptoms are often subtle.
sentences.chinese: 排卵迹象和征候通常很微妙。

sentences.english: A storm is only as the outskirts of His robe, the symptom of His advent, the environment of His presence.
sentences.chinese: 风浪是神义袍的边襟，再临的征候，同在的证据。

sentences.english: The Government must not ignore these symptoms of present economic problems.
sentences.chinese: 政府不应忽视这些现存经济问题的征候。

sentences.english: Drug-induced hypersensitivity syndrome (DIHS) is a severe drug eruption with characteristic symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 药物超敏反应综合征是一种具有特异征候的重症药疹。

definition: omen/sign (that sth is about to happen)/warning sign
interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
(TCM) six excesses causing illness, namely: excessive wind 風|风[feng1], cold 寒[han2], heat 暑[shu3], damp 濕|湿[shi1], dryness 燥[zao4], fire 火[huo3]
